Package it.polimi.ingsw.server.controller

Class Pinger

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.server.controller.Pinger
All Implemented Interfaces:
Runnable
public class Pinger extends Object implements Runnable
This class represents a TimerTask that sends "PING" messages to all the Dispatchers that are connected to a certain Match. This class is immutable and relative to a single "wave" of PING/PONG message exchanges (one PING to every connected client). This task is intended to be run periodically.
See Also:
  • Match
  • Dispatcher

    TERM_REASON
    A String representing the reason of the possible termination of the Match.
    private final long
    timeoutInMillis
    The time (expressed in milliseconds) this thread waits for every PONG message to arrive.

      public Pinger(Match match, long timeoutInMillis)

  • Method Details

    • run

      public void run()
      Main method of the class, it sends PING messages to all the connected Dispatchers and waits for them to respond (through notifyResponse(Dispatcher)). After timeoutInMillis has passed, if some client hasn't responded, it closes the match.
      Specified by:
      run in interface Runnable

    • notifyResponse

      public void notifyResponse(Dispatcher dispatcher)
      This method notifies this Pinger that the specified Dispatcher has responded to the PING message.
      Parameters:
      dispatcher - the Dispatcher that sent the "PONG" message
